Report.Query: select ROWNUM as Sequence, STATION_ID as StationID, STATION_NAME as StationName, Electronic_board as ElectronicBoard, Shelter as Shelter, Harbor_shaped as HarborShaped, Length , Routes, Longitude, Latitude, Area_code as AREACODE, row_number() over (order by ROWNUM) as RowNumber, count(*) over () as TotalItems from RPT_BUSIQUERY_STATION
